globalblocking-desc: [[Special:GlobalBlock|Allows]] accounts, IP addresses, and IP ranges to be [[Special:GlobalBlockList|blocked across multiple wikis]]
globalblocking-block-intro: You can use this page to block a user or an IP address on all wikis.
globalblocking-block-reason-dropdown:
* Common block reasons
** Crosswiki spamming
** Crosswiki abuse
** Vandalism
globalblocking-target: Username, IP address, or IP range:
globalblocking-target-with-block-ids: Username, IP address, IP range, or block ID:
globalblocking-block-enable-autoblock: Automatically globally block the {{PLURAL:$1|last IP address|last $1 IP addresses}} used by this user, and any subsequent IP addresses they try to edit from, for a period of $2
globalblocking-block-target-invalid: The username, IP address, or IP range ($1) you entered is invalid.
globalblocking-block-expiryinvalid: The expiration you entered is invalid.
globalblocking-block-anononly-on-account: Blocks on accounts cannot only apply to anonymous users.
globalblocking-block-enable-autoblock-on: Autoblocks can only be enabled for blocks on accounts.
globalblocking-block-success: '''$1''' has been blocked on all wikis.
globalblocking-modify-success: The global block on '''$1''' has been modified.
globalblocking-local-failed: Blocking the user locally failed as the given user already is blocked on this wiki.
globalblocking-block-failure: An error occurred while attempting to globally block $1. Please try again.
globalblocking-block-alreadyblocked:
$1 is already blocked globally.
You can view the existing block on the [[Special:GlobalBlockList|list of global blocks]],
or modify the settings of the existing block by re-submitting this form.
globalblocking-bigrange:
The range you specified ($1) exceeds the limits.
The $2 limit is a /$3 range.
globalblocking-also-local: Also block the given user locally on this wiki
globalblocking-also-local-talk: Block user from editing their own talk page locally
globalblocking-also-local-email: Block user from sending email locally
globalblocklist-summary:
This is a list of all global blocks which are currently in effect.
Some blocks are marked as locally disabled: this means that they apply on other sites, but a local administrator has decided to disable them on this wiki. Global autoblocks are automatically locally disabled if the target IP is listed at [[MediaWiki:Block-autoblock-exemptionlist]]. If an autoblock is automatically locally disabled because the IP is listed on [[MediaWiki:Block-autoblock-exemptionlist]], this is not disclosed publicly.
globalblocking-list: List of globally blocked IP addresses and accounts
globalblocking-list-target-invalid:
The user you searched for ($1) is invalid.
Please enter a valid IP address or username.
globalblocking-list-noresults: No results were found with the provided parameters.
globalblocking-goto-status: Change local status for a global block
globalblocking-return: Return to the list of global blocks
globalblocking-notblocked: The user ($1) you entered is not globally blocked.
globalblocking-notblocked-id: No global block exists with the ID $1.
globalblocking-unblock-unblocked: You have removed the global block on the user '''$1'''.
globalblocking-unblock-unblocked-for-id-: You have removed the global block '''#$1'''.
globalblocking-unblock-intro: You can use this form to remove a global block.
globalblocking-whitelist-notapplied:
Global blocks are not applied at this wiki,
so the local status of global blocks cannot be modified.
globalblocking-whitelist-whitelisted: You have disabled the global block #$2 on the user '''$1''' on {{SITENAME}}.
globalblocking-whitelist-dewhitelisted: You have re-enabled the global block #$2 on the user '''$1''' on {{SITENAME}}.
globalblocking-whitelist-whitelisted-tar: You have disabled the global block #$1 on {{SITENAME}}.
globalblocking-whitelist-dewhitelisted-t: You have re-enabled the global block #$1 on {{SITENAME}}.
globalblocking-whitelist-nochange: You made no change to the local status of this block.
globalblocking-whitelist-intro:
You can use this form to edit the local status of a global block.
If a global block is disabled on this wiki, affected users will be able to edit normally.
globalblocking-logpagetext:
This is a log of global blocks which have been made and removed on this wiki.
It should be noted that global blocks can be made and removed on other wikis, and that these global blocks may affect this wiki.
To view all active global blocks, you may view the [[Special:GlobalBlockList|global block list]].
globalblocking-logentry-block: $1 {{GENDER:$2|globally blocked}} {{GENDER:$4|$3}} with an expiration time of $5 $6
globalblocking-logentry-modify: $1 {{GENDER:$2|changed}} global block settings for {{GENDER:$4|$3}} with an expiration time of $5 $6
globalblocking-loglink: The user $1 is blocked globally ([[{{#Special:GlobalBlockList}}/$1|full details]]).
globalblocking-contribs-notice:
This user is currently globally blocked.
The global block log entry is provided below for reference:
globalblocking-contribs-mock-log-line: $1: $3 globally {{GENDER:$2|blocked}} {{GENDER:$4|$5}} with an expiration time of $6 $7 $8 $9
globalblocking-showlog:
This user has been blocked previously.
The block log is provided below for reference:
grant-globalblock: Globally block or unblock a user
globalblocking-blockedtext-all-wikis: Your IP address has been blocked on all wikis.
globalblocking-blockedtext-on-range: Your IP address is in a range which has been blocked on all wikis.
globalblocking-blockedtext-on-proxy: One or more proxy servers used by your request is globally blocked
globalblocking-blockedtext-on-user: Your account has been blocked on all wikis.
globalblocking-blockedtext-autoblock-int: Your IP address has been automatically globally blocked because it was used by another user, who was blocked by $1.
One or more proxy servers used by your request has been automatically globally blocked because it was used by another user, who was blocked by $1.
globalblocking-blockedtext-blocker-admin: You can contact $1 to discuss the block.
globalblocking-blockedtext-email-feature: You cannot use the "{{int:emailuser}}" feature unless a valid email address is specified in your [[Special:Preferences|account preferences]] and you have not been blocked from using it.
globalblocking-autoblocker:
Globally autoblocked because your IP address has been recently used by "[[User:$1|$1]]".
The reason given for $1's block is "$2"
globalblocking-autoblocker-hidden-block: Globally autoblocked because your IP address has been recently used by a user blocked by block ID #$1.
